input_var = Variable(batch_input.cuda())
target_var = Variable(batch_target.cuda())

to support GPU. Of course, it would be better if we could conveniently choose whether we want to use GPU upon the initiation of a trainer.

body:
Here's an issue. This module seems to lack the support for GPU, but you may modify the 57 and 58 lines of `trainer.py` to be:
```
input_var = Variable(batch_input.cuda())
target_var = Variable(batch_target.cuda())
```
to support GPU. Of course, it would be better if we could conveniently choose whether we want to use GPU upon the initiation of a `trainer`.
